history.text: Are you there?
Hi, yes I'm here
How are you doing today?
Hello?
I'm in a good mood! I just finished watching an animation movie that made me have a good laugh, Despicable Me. Do you like 3D cartoon comedy movies?
Yes I do they are actually my favourite.
Very entertaining.
Awesome! I think it's a really great movie, but I don't understand why the average rating on Rotten Tomatoes would be 6.8/10. What do you think of the rating?
Me too i would give it like a 9.
I agree. Also I loved Steve Carell as Gru. Did you?
Yes i do.
I can't wait to see it again as soon as i have some free time to spae.
spare.
Well I hope you will enjoy it a second time! I have Pharrell's song stuck in my head right now
I can imagine.
I see we share the same thoughts.
We do :) anyway I love the scene when Gru decides to steal the moon because he is so disheartened that some other supervillain stole the Great Pyramid of Giza
Yeah i enjoy that part too.
I wonder if there is gonna be another episode? what do yo think?
It's so comical that there is a Bank of Evil for supervillains
Yes that's my opinion too.

I am not sure about there being another episode, but did you know that it was directed by Pierre Coffin and Chris Renaud as their feature debut film? Wow, I guess you need a really good story and some courage to debut with such a movie

Yeah gr
eat movie.

Oh there's another thing I love about this movie by the way, which is the conflict in the heart of the villain. The scene in which Dr. Nefario decides to send the girls back to the orphanage because Gru's mission is more important really broke my heart, even though there's a happy ending
Yeah that was very touching for me too but i always like movies with happy endings.
Me too! Do you usually watch movies with good ratings or do you also watch movies with bad ratings at times?
both but i prefer good ratings.
Yeah I agree... Do you generally like animation movies or do you prefer other movie genres?
love annimated moves.
makes me feel like a kid again.

Same... and I always disagree when they tell me they're just for kids and not adults. some of them even have very complicated plots, for example I could never invent a story in which the Moon gets shrinked and stolen and then it starts to expand again inside the ship of the villain... you need a lot of imagination even for an adult
Yes that's so true.
And yet the critical response for this movie hasn't been great, I mean, it was judged as just likeable

Yeah everyone see's things differently, but i believe that it is an awe
some movie.
Some of the responses said it was funny, some said it did not have a real impact. I believe it is actually great for both kids and adults.
thanks for chatting about this with me! hope you'll watch it again soon!
Sure you too.
